name: Christopher Robin
subtitle: Adventurer
author: Eri Welli

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: Can Christopher Robin- Adventurer’s We’ll Always Be Together ability trigger more than once in a turn?
A: Yes, it can.

flavor_text: Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand? —Christopher Robin
rules_text: WE'LL ALWAYS BE TOGETHER Whenever you ready this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.
